title: 문순재
content:
서울
자연과학대학
물리학과
교수이다.
연구실:
Condensed Matter Spectroscopy Laboratory

연구관심분야
학력
[2009] Ph. D., Department of Physics and Astronomy, Seoul National University
[2003] B. S. , Department of Physics and Astronomy, Seoul National University
경력
[Mar. 2017 ~ Present] Associate Professor, Department of Physics, Hanyang University
[Feb. 2018 ~ Feb. 2019] Visiting Professor, Department of Physics, University of California, San Diego
[Mar. 2012 ~ Feb. 2017] Assistant Professor, Department of Physics, Hanyang University
[Oct. 2009 ~ Feb. 2012] Postdoctoral Researcher, University of California, San Diego
[Feb. 2009 ~ Sep. 2009] Postdoctoral Researcher, Department of Physics and Astronomy, Seoul National University
수상
[2013] Cheongam Science Fellowpship (POSCO TJPark Foundation)
[2009] Young Physicist Award (Korean Physical Society)
[2009] Excellent Ph.D Thesis Award (College of Natural Science, Seoul Nat'l Univ.)
[2008] Graduate Student Research Award (Korean Synchrotron User's Association)
연구관심분야
5d 전이금속 이리듐 산화물 스핀-궤도 결합의 효과, 전자 상호작용 효과, 금속-비금속 전이
3d/4d 전이금속산화물 전하-스핀-오비탈-격자 상호작용, 금속-비금속 전이, 다강체
구리 산화물, 철 계열 고온 초전도체 유사갭 현상, 도핑에 따른 전자구조/전자동역학 변화
